--- title: module nbdev_sample keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "API details." description: "API details." ---
{% raw %}

say_hello[source]

say_hello(to)

Say Hello to Somebody

say_hello("liuliu")

'Hello liuliu!'
assert say_hello('liuliu') == 'Hello liuliu!'

say_goodbye[source]

say_goodbye(c)

Say goodbye to Somebody

say_goodbye("liuliu")

'Goodbye liuliu!'
assert say_goodbye("liuliu") == "Goodbye liuliu!"
{% endraw %}
